instructions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Heat George Foreman or panini grill.
In small bowl combine feta, olives and oregano.
Slice 2-inch pocket in side of chicken pieces. Stuff with feta mixture; chicken breasts will be full. Sprinkle with Italian seasoning.
Grill for 6 to 7 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink.
Heat sauce in small saucepan over low heat. Serve chicken with pasta. Pour sauce over pasta and chicken.
ingredients: 2 cups Archer Farms four cheese pasta sauce
title: Mediterranean Chicken with Pasta
